reviews.review: É o melhor jogo de puzzles que eu já joguei, simplesmente incrível!! Personagens muito bom desenvolvidos, uma mecânica de jogo que me fez quebrar a cabeça muitas vezes kkkk recomendo muito ele :3

Прекрасная игра, которая не нуждается в представлении. Идеально выдержан баланс сложности загадок, великолепный юмор, да и сама атмосфера выдержана безукоризненно. От этой игры невозможно оторваться и прекрасно, когда есть вещи, которые заставляют тебя думать головой и в тоже время невероятно развлекают. Мультиплеер это вообще отдельное удовольствие и играя в него можно провести замечательные часы вместе с верным другом.
Однозначно рекомендуется любителям головоломок.
Easily one of my favorite games of all time
Mucho mejor en todo en cuanto al uno se refiere y da muchas mas horas

It’s a good game, with excellent game concept of portal , make you think and stuff
My favorite Game of All Time

I have played a lot of games in my life and whilst I had heard of the portal games, I had never played them.  I played The Talos Principle a few years ago and assumed (wrongly) that the games would be like that.  Portal 1 was good but Portal 2 was incredible and it blew me away.  I felt like it was 5 games in one, it kept going on and on and I was so thoroughly immersed in it, in the lore, the humour, the stunning look of the backgrounds, the voice acting, I realised very early on that it was probably my all time favourite game and I felt a traitor to myself because the Witcher 3 has held that spot for a long time.  It just goes to show how good this game must be for it to knock the Witcher off the top spot.  I'm going to play it again I loved it so much.

My favorite game of all time. Best puzzler with great sense of humor and awesome cast. There's more lore than what's presented in the base game which makes all the discovery's you find even more worthwhile.

Campaign is fun and challenging enough for new players. Co-op is also fun if you have a friend. However, get ready to feel either dumb or carrying a dumb partner if you play Co-Op. The workshop levels are where this game really shines though. Some of them are very challenging. This game is definitely worth picking up if its on sale.
